name: Movieoftheday
0:
”Alexa, start movie of the day”
”Alexa, open movie of the day”
”Alexa, launch movie of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie of the day
des: Get to know about the most discussed movies. Need to watch a movie but cannot decide which one? Simple just ask movie of the day. It recommends only the best movies, and you can be sure that you won't be disappointed after watching a movie suggested by the movie of the day. So have you watched every movie on the list yet? If you haven't, just start today!!. What more, with frequent updates to the list, you can be assured that the movies suggested are top notch. You can start by saying "What is the movie of the day"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
